name: plyr
readme: # Plyr A simple, lightweight, accessible and customizable HTML5, YouTube and Vimeo media player that supports [_modern_](#browser-support) browsers. [Checkout the demo](https://plyr.io) - [Donate to support Plyr](#donate) - [Chat on Slack](https://bit.ly/plyr-chat) [![Image of Plyr](https://cdn.plyr.io/static/demo/screenshot.png?v=3)](https://plyr.io) ## Features * **Accessible** - full support for VTT captions and screen readers * **[Customisable](#html)** - make the player look how you want with the markup you want * **Good HTML** - uses the _right_ elements. `` for volume and `` for progress and well, `
